title: ‘Bomb in a China Shop’: AI to Wipe Out Jobs, Create Election Uncertainties, Congress Hears

title: LIVE NOW: ChatGPT Chief Testifies Before Congress as Concerns Grow About Risks From AI
description: Samuel Altman, CEO of OpenAI, is sworn in prior to giving testimony before the Senate Judiciary Subcommittee on Privacy, Technology, and the Law in Washington on May 16, 2023. (Win McNamee/Getty Images)

title: Twitter Further Explains Why It Restricted Content Leading up to Turkey’s Election

title: Musk’s Request to Modify Deal Requiring Vetting of His Twitter Posts Denied by Appeals Court
